Nous ne le présentons plus ! Counter Strike, premier du nom ! Au top !

Le célèbre Counter Strike  1.6 m'a laisser de très bon souvenirs, et le gameplay est toujours aussi sympa à jouer même aujourd'hui en 2022 !

Je continue à faire quelques parties pour la nostalgie et c'est très appréciable !
It was my first match in counter strike, some mf came from the back killing me with a knife -_-

Counter-Strike players are divided into opposing teams of terrorists (T) and special forces (counter-terrorists, CT). By controlling one of the fighters, the player must ensure the victory of his team, mainly destroying opponents for several rounds.

Clashes take place in areas called maps. Each fighter has a stock of health, primary weapons and funds. With the funds you can buy other weapons, armor or equipment such as a night vision device or shield. The player is provided with information about health, armor, time until the end of the round, number of allies, ammunition and funds. Also on the screen shows a radar showing the location of the fighters, and information about who killed whom and from what weapon.

In the beginning, the player chooses a card, a team and one of its four fighters. Classes of fighters are cosmetic - they differ only in appearance, but the appearance can contribute to camouflage, depending on the map. The teams start the fight by being at the "base" around which there is a "shopping area". Being in it, the player can buy useful things at his own discretion. The round continues until the goal is reached, or one of the teams destroys the other. In the event of the death of his fighter, the player continues to watch the fight until the end of the round. When the round is over, the teams receive funds (winners of a larger amount) and in full force are again on their "bases" (respawn).
